services.title: Fullstack Software Engineering
services.description: As a software engineer and a Hack Bright Academy graduate, I am passionate about creating captivating and scalable web applications using Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and various frameworks and tools. I have a solid foundation in computer science fundamentals, such as data structures, algorithms, and relational databases, enabling me to design robust and efficient solutions.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Contributing to the development of user authentication systems and back-end connections, Integrating applications with AWS for seamless cloud operations, and applying MVC patterns for organized and efficient coding practices.

aboutpara: Clarke began his journey in a software engineering program at Hack Bright Academy. He acquired full-stack web development skills and computer science fundamentals. Clarke had always been fascinated by technology and attended some college-level programming classes. Before enrolling in Hackbright, Clarke held leadership positions in customer service. This job taught him valuable lessons in problem-solving, communication, and being a dependable team member for his superiors. Though Clarke enjoyed his previous career, he felt eager for a new challenge. His aptitude for problem-solving and communication fueled his ambition to pursue a software engineering role after completing his studies at Hackbright.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with Python, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Contributing to the development of user authentication systems and back-end connections, Integrating our application with AWS for seamless cloud operations, Applying MVC pattern for organized and efficient coding practices

Trained and mentored new hires, achieving proficiency in policies and systems, Exceeded team averages in contact per hour and quality assurance scores, Fostered teamwork contributing to a positive and productive work environment
Progressed from Representative to Manager leading a successful health CS team.  Consistently surpassed key performance indicators, Led hiring training and management of the customer service team
